explains: adj. 无意义的；无目的的

sentences.en: We fill up our lives with meaningless tasks.
sentences.cn: 我们终日忙忙碌碌，过得毫无意义。

sentences.en: Unloved and uncared-for, they live a meaningless hand to mouth existence.
sentences.cn: 没人疼爱也没人照顾，他们过着一种毫无意义、勉强糊口的日子。

sentences.en: The essay was a meaningless jumble of ideas.
sentences.cn: 这篇散文思想混乱，使人不知所云。
